name: XETown Trendy Pop Colorful
additional_info:
v.0.0.3 색상 최적화, 추가된 요소 대응, 기타 등등
v.0.0.2 코드 최적화, 프로필 이미지 원형, 색상 수정, 길이 수정, 기타 자잘한 수정
v.0.0.1 첫번째 릴리즈
css: @-moz-document domain("xetown.com"){.fixed_header .header_wrap,.login_widget .signin .btn_submit{background-color:#22adc2}.login_widget .signin .btn_submit:hover,.login_widget .signin .btn_submit:active{background-color:#159cb1}.body .sub_desc{padding:0;margin:0;background:rgba(0,0,0,0);border:none;box-shadow:none;font-weight:700}.visual.sub .sub_title h1{font-weight:900;color:#22adc2}.visual.sub .sub_title h1:after{background-color:#22adc2;height:1px}.gnb>ul>li>a:hover .guide,.gnb>ul>li>a:active .guide,.gnb>ul>li>a:focus .guide,.gnb>ul>li.on>a .guide,.gnb>ul>li>a:hover,.gnb>ul>li>a:active,.gnb>ul>li>a:focus,.gnb>ul>li.on>a{color:#22adc2;background-color:#f3f3f3}.gnb>ul .depth2{background-color:#f3f3f3}.gnb>ul .depth2>li:focus,.gnb>ul .depth2>li:active,.gnb>ul .depth2>li:hover{background-color:#22adc2}.gnb>ul .depth2:after{background-color:#69d2e7}.fixed_header .header_wrap.shrink{background-color:#22adc2}.header>.side>ul .ly.ly_login ul,.login_widget .signin #warning{background-color:#f35c9f}.header>.side>ul .ly a:hover{color:#ffcee4}.ic_edge{border-color:transparent transparent #f35c9f!important}.xe_updated_ver .btn_item:hover,.xe_updated_ver .btn_item:active .xe_updated_ver .btn_item:focus{background-color:#22adc2;border-color:#22adc2}.xe_updated_ver .btn_item{border-color:#b3b3b3;border-radius:0;color:#22adc2}.footer{border-bottom:5px solid #22adc2}.footer .f_cr_area{background-color:#444}.login_widget .signin input[type=checkbox]:checked~.checkbox{-webkit-animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-fill-mode:forwards;-webkit-animation:checkboxOn .5s;animation:checkboxOn .5s;border-color:#22adc2;background-image:-webkit-linear-gradient(315deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(315deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(45deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(45deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(315deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(45deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),-webkit-linear-gradient(#22adc2,#22adc2);background-image:linear-gradient(135deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),linear-gradient(135deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),linear-gradient(45deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),linear-gradient(45deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),linear-gradient(135deg,#22adc2 50%,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%),linear-gradient(45deg,rgba(204,162,86,0)50%,#22adc2 50%),linear-gradient(#22adc2,#22adc2);background-position:50% 3px,5px -5px,-11px -5px,-9px 0,-6px -2px,0 -12px,40px 0}.login_widget .signin>.login-header>h1{font-family:'Helvetica Neue','AppleSDGothicNeo','NanumGothic','NanumBareunGothic';font-weight:100}.header>.side>.member_level .level_bar .levelPer{color:#f3f3f3}.header>.side>.member_level .level_bar .progress_bar{background-color:#f35c9f}.header>.side>.member_level .level_bar{background-color:#f3f3f3}.body.sub .lnb{background:#22adc2}.body .lnb>ul>li>a,.body .lnb>ul>li>span{color:#f3f3f3}.cmt_editor{border-radius:0}.simple_wrt .bd_btn{border-radius:3px;background:rgba(255,255,255,0)!important;border:1px solid #22adc2!important;box-shadow:none!important;color:#22adc2;text-shadow:none;font-weight:900}.show_document_reader dd.comment_member{background:#f3f3f3;box-shadow:none}.fdb_tag{border:solid 1px #eee}.cmt_editor{margin-bottom:10px!important}.bd .profile{border-radius:100%;padding:0}div.fdb_nav.img_tx span.vote.ui_font i.fa.fa-check-circle.read{color:#22adc2!important}.rd_ft_nav{padding-bottom:10px}.bd .rd_nav{margin:10px 0 0}.bd .rd_vote a.bd_login{border:2px solid #22adc2!important;color:#22adc2!important}.bd .rd_vote a.bd_login.blamed{border:2px solid #999!important;color:#999!important}.bd .rd_vote a{border-radius:100%;padding:10px}.rd_sign{width:100%;border-radius:0}.rd_sign .img{border-radius:100%}.rd_tag .bg_f_color.border_color{display:none!important}.rd_tag{padding:5px 0 0 10px}.rd_tag li span.comma{display:none}.rd_tag li a{font-weight:900;color:#666;padding:2px 4px}.rd_tag li a::before{content:"#"}.rd_tag li a:hover{text-decoration:none;background-color:#fff}.rd_body.clear{margin-bottom:10px}.show_document_reader dl{margin:5px 10px}.show_document_reader ul::-webkit-scrollbar-track{-webkit-box-shadow:none;border-radius:0;background-color:#f5f5f5}.show_document_reader ul::-webkit-scrollbar{width:6px;background-color:#f5f5f5}.show_document_reader ul::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:0;-webkit-box-shadow:none;background-color:#aaa}.body .lnb>ul>li.on{background-color:#69d2e7}.bannerContent .bx-wrapper .bx-controls-direction a:hover{background-color:#69d2e7}.show_document_reader img,.show_document_reader .noprofile{border-radius:100%}.show_document_reader dd.comment_vote_member{box-shadow:none;background:#ddd}.rd_hd .board .top_area{border:solid 1px #ccc}.rd_hd .board .btm_area{border:1px solid #ddd;border-top:none}div.xetownWidgetStyle .widgetTitle{border-color:#22adc2}div.xetownWidgetStyle .widgetTitle a.widgetMoreLink{background:#22adc2}.boardInformation em,.boardInformation strong{color:#22adc2}.pointInfo li span{color:#f35c9f}.buttonOfficial,.buttonOfficial span,.buttonOfficial input,.buttonOfficial button{background:#22adce;color:#fff;border-radius:3px}.listOrder{margin-bottom:-28px}.fileList span[style="COLOR: #acacac"]{color:rgba(255,255,255,.5)!important}.fileList span[style="color: rgb(120, 32, 185); "]{color:#f35c9f!important}.filelnfoX span[style="COLOR: #a6cf00"]{color:#22adc2!important}.show_author_document h2,.show_document_reader h2 span{background:#22adc2}.show_author_document ul li a .mark.newest{background:#69d2e7}.bd em,.bd .color{color:#22adc2}}
